####Gr√°fica interactiva

```{r Gr√°fica interactiva}

   plot_ly(x = ~ Dia, y = ~IValor, type = "scatter",
           mode = "marker",
           color = ~ Indicador) %>%
   layout(title = "Coronavirus La Plata - en % ",
          xaxis = list (title = ".",

```
